A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The townspeople form an alliance against the mother, while the son joins up with an unlikely group that includes the towns priest, who is also a sorcerer.
What starts off as something deliciously creepy because of Krige's biggest villainess role turns into pure cheese by end credits. Some good twists early on
